scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint:check
scripts.reformat: npm run eslint:fix && npm run prettier:write
scripts.firebase:emulate-cy: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only auth,functions,firestore,hosting,storage --import=../cypress/fixtures/firebase
scripts.firebase:emulate-cy:run: npm run build && firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,hosting,storage --project=demo-cypress-test --import=../cypress/fixtures/firebase "npm run cy:run"
scripts.firebase:emulate-cy:open: npm run build && firebase emulators:exec --ui --only auth,functions,firestore,storage --project=demo-cypress-test --import=../cypress/fixtures/firebase "npm run cy:open"
scripts.firebase:emulate-cy:circle: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only auth,functions,firestore,hosting,storage --project=demo-cypress-test --import=../cypress/fixtures/firebase
scripts.firebase:emulate-functions: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.firebase:emulate-functions-hosting: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,hosting
scripts.firebase:emulate-functions-hosting:debug: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,hosting --inspect-functions
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
